items.d: Grass types, mowing basics, common problems, and practical fixes.
Identification first, then control: weeds, insects, and common lawn diseases.
Watering schedules, sprinkler setups, drainage issues, and fixes that work.
Soil basics, nutrients, pH, and amendments that actually move the needle.
Tools that matter, maintenance, and safety rules that prevent dumb injuries.

items.t: Warm Season vs Cool Season Grasses Explained
items.d: Clear differences between warm-season and cool-season grasses, when each thrives, and how growth patterns affect mowing, watering, and color.

items.t: What Type of Grass Do I Have
items.d: This guide explains how to identify lawn grass by growth habit, leaf shape, texture, and seasonal behavior without lab tests or guesswork.
